snippet: The authorities had detained Mr. Bahgat after summoning him for interrogation about a report he had published on convictions against 26 officers for plotting a coup.
abstract: Egyptian military releases investigative journalist and human rights advocate Hossam Bahgat; writer may still face charges of publishing false news.
lead_paragraph: The authorities had detained Mr. Bahgat after summoning him for interrogation about a report he had published on convictions against 26 officers for plotting a coup.

headline.main: Hossam Bahgat, Journalist and Advocate, Is Released by Egypt’s Military
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Egypt: Military Releases Journalist

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
